text_ruling: Does [Whitespace](/en/card/30074) check for the Runner having 6 or less before or after the Runner loses 3? >After. Resolve each subroutine 1 at a time, in the order they appear on the card.

Can the Runner lose credits hosted on [Overclock](/en/card/30029) or [Penumbral Toolkit](/en/card/26081) for the first subroutine on [Whitespace](/en/card/30074)?
>No. Those credits are only available to be spent. “Losing” credits always drains the Runner’s credit pool.

Do credits hosted on cards like [Overclock](/en/card/30029) and [Penumbral Toolkit](/en/card/26081) count toward whether the Runner has more than 6? >No. The Runner only “has” credits in their credit pool. The abilities on these cards only allow players to spend their hosted credits.
